text: Log tumse ‘kalalah’(inheritance from those woh have left behind no lineal heirs) ke maamle mein fatwa puchte hain. Kaho Allah tumhein fatwa deta hai: agar koi shaks be-aulad marr jaye aur uski ek behan ho to woh uske tarke (what he has left behind) mein se nisf(half) paayegi, aur agar behan be-aulad marey to bhai uska waris hoga. Agar mayyat ki waris do behnein hon to woh tarke mein se do-tihayi (two-third) ki haqqdar hongi, aur agar kayi bhai behnein hon to auraton ka ekehra aur mardon ka dohra hissa (then the male shall have the share of two females) hoga. Allah tumhare liye ehkaam ki tauzeeh (makes clear) karta hai taa-ke tum bhatakte na phiro aur Allah har cheez ka ilm rakhta hai
